presentation.title: Quentin HAZEMANN
presentation.subtitle: Second-year student in an integrated preparatory programme

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.paragraph1: My name is Quentin Hazemann, I'm a student at CESI, currently in the first year of IT engineering programme. Passionate about computer science, I enjoy tackling diverse projects in web d√©veloppent, embedded systems, and networking. I love applying my skills, and exploring new technologies while solving real-world problems both independently and with a team.
aboutme.paragraph2: My academic background has provided me with a strong skillset in various areas, including software development, agile project management, and IT networking. I've also obtained certifications such as : Cisco CCNA1.
aboutme.paragraph3: Curious, autonomous, and rigorous, I am looking to further develop my skills by contributing to projects that allow me to learn every day. My professional goal is to become a versatile developer.

aboutschool.title: About my school
aboutschool.paragraph1: I am currently pursuing my engineering degree at CESI, a higher education institution recognised in France for its excellent training programmes in the fields of computer science, engineering and digital technology.
aboutschool.paragraph2: At CESI, the focus is on project-based learning, innovative teaching, and getting us ready for the professional world. We spend a lot of time on internships and collaborative projects. The school trains engineers who are both technically skilled and able to adapt to the current challenges of the digital world.
aboutschool.paragraph3: Thanks to this training, I am developing solid skills in software development, IT architecture, project management, and methodologies. The school also values commitment, professional ethics, and autonomy, qualities that I strive to apply in all my projects.
aboutschool.paragraph4: For more information : https://www.cesi.fr/en

skills.presentation: Here is an overview of my main skills, acquired through my professional experience, personal projects and training.
